original_title: President holds discussion with CBSL Governor and Finance Secretary
original_body_lines: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake met with the Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL) Governor Dr. Nandalal Weerasinghe and Treasury Secretary Mahinda Siriwardena on Wednesday.

The current economic situation of the country was discussed at length during the meeting, according to the Department of Government Information. It added that measures to stabilise the economy and several issues affecting the country’s economy were also discussed.
